title: White Painting
provenance_text:
Jiro Yoshihara [1905-1972], Ashiya, Japan; Martha Jackson Gallery, New York, NY [1]; purchased by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, November 1958.

Notes:
[1]. The painting was exhibited (no. 485, illustrated in the catalogue, plate 35) in "The 1958 Pittsburgh Bicentennial International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at Carnegie Institute, December 1958 - February 1959. 
[2]. The painting was purchased by Carnegie Institute from the International, as a gift from James M. Bovard, Pittsburgh, PA. It was accessioned on November 21, 1958. Payment to Martha Jackson Gallery was sent on January 13, 1959.
